line_1: Besides they are resolv'd they'll not undress:
line_2: They would appear all eager of Success,

line_1: Besides they are resolv'd they'll not undress:
line_2: But are more cautious, cause their Charms less,

line_1: I'll strip thee of thy borrow'd plumes; undress,
line_2: And shew thee in thy native ugliness.

line_1: For I got to a Place where the Ladies undress;
line_2: Yet in searching about I had better Success,
